name.fr: Parchemin de changement de nom de bébé ramasseur
name.jp: 収集ペット改名の巻物
name.sp: Pergamino de Cambio de Nombre de Mascota
name.vi: Cuộn thay đổi tên thú cưng

description.en: A Special Scroll used to name your summoned pet. This scroll only works on pickup pets.
description.ar: A Special Scroll used to name your summoned pet. This scroll only works on pickup pets.
description.br: Um pergaminho para a mudança de nome do seu pet invocado. Esse pergaminho só irá funcionar para pets de coleta.
description.cns: 用来给当前召唤宠物命名的特殊卷轴。 此卷轴仅适用于捡宠。
description.de: Eine spezielle Schriftrolle um deinen Begleiter zu benennen. Diese Schriftrolle funktioniert nur bei Sammelbegleitern.
description.fi: A Special Scroll used to name your summoned pet. This scroll only works on pickup pets.
description.fil: A Special Scroll used to name your summoned pet. This scroll only works on pickup pets.
description.fr: Un parchemin spécial vous permettant de nommer votre bébé ramasseur. Celui-ci doit être invoqué.
description.id: Scroll Khusus yang digunakan untuk memberi nama hewan peliharaan yang Anda panggil. Gulungan ini hanya berfungsi pada hewan peliharaan pickup.
description.it: A Special Scroll used to name your summoned pet. This scroll only works on pickup pets.
description.jp: 召喚したペットに名前を付けることが出来る巻物。この巻物は収集ペットにのみ有効です。
description.kr: 소환된 애완동물의 이름을 짓는데 사용되는 특별한 두루마리입니다. 이 두루마리는 픽업펫한테만 적용됩니다.
description.nl: A Special Scroll used to name your summoned pet. This scroll only works on pickup pets.
description.pl: A Special Scroll used to name your summoned pet. This scroll only works on pickup pets.
description.ru: A Special Scroll used to name your summoned pet. This scroll only works on pickup pets.
description.sp: Un Pergamino Especial para poner nombre a tu mascota invocada. Este pergamino sólo funciona con mascotas de recogida.
description.sw: A Special Scroll used to name your summoned pet. This scroll only works on pickup pets.
description.th: คัมภีร์พิเศษที่ใช้ตั้งชื่อสัตว์เลี้ยงที่คุณเรียก ม้วนนี้ใช้ได้เฉพาะกับสัตว์เลี้ยงปิ๊กอัพเท่านั้น
description.tw: 可替召喚的寵物命名，此卷軸只適用於撿寵
description.vi: Một cuộn đặc biệt được sử dụng để đặt tên cho thú cưng được triệu hồi của bạn. Cuộn này chỉ hoạt động trên vật nuôi đón.
